questions.quote: All right, you guys listen, I've got to wait here for Elaine, I'll meet you in front of the theatre.
Mr Wilhelm, listen. You've been abducted! Please, Mr Wilhelm, you gotta listen to me!
And that Morty, I'll tell ya that guy is full of life.  He was convinced Monet was near sighted. I kept telling him
I could've! I mean, last week we waited for that friend of Kramer's for like, forty minutes.
The circumcision was perfect. The finger was your fault! You flinched!
Look at him, Elaine. How gorgeous is he? I ask you, how gorgeous?
We're going to sign it. We're going to sign it. In fact George is out with the woman from NBC right now.
Well, Leslie, sometimes the road less travelled is less travelled for a reason.
No. No. I'm gonna stay home. I want to be close to my home base in case there's any news from the front.
Yeah, yeah, yeah we could. You know, ah, Kramer, the next time you talk to her, find out if she knows Kelly, from Monk's. I wanna know if she really has a boyfriend.
